title: Samina Mushtaq Pagganwala
text:
Samina Mushtaq Pagganwala () is a Pakistani politician who served as member of the <a href="National%20Assembly%20of%20Pakistan">National Assembly of Pakistan</a>.
Political career.
She was elected to the <a href="National%20Assembly%20of%20Pakistan">National Assembly of Pakistan</a> as a candidate of <a href="Pakistan%20Peoples%20Party">Pakistan Peoples Party</a> on a seat reserved for women from <a href="Punjab%2C%20Pakistan">Punjab</a> in the <a href="2008%20Pakistani%20general%20election">2008 Pakistani general election</a>. In 2011, she was appointed parliamentary secretary for Kashmir affairs and Gilgit-Baltistan.
